director.name: 弗拉基米尔·雷昂  Vladimir Léon

introduction: In a farm amidst the French Alps, Jean-Philippe Valla, a farmer, develops energy and food self-sufficiency techniques. Julie Desprairies, a choreographer, works there with her team. Farming gestures and dance gestures merge as the agricultural and the choreography works seek a fairer way to inhabit the world.源自：https://www.cinemadureel.org/en/films/tes-jambes-nues-2/
